tud.iir.helper
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      tud.iir.helper.Logger
Deprecated. DON'T USE THIS ANYMORE The Logger is responsible for logging messages. It can be instantiated as singleton (global logger) and for each purpose with a dedicated name. 

public final class Logger
extends java.util.Observable

public java.lang.String getRuntime(boolean splitUp)
Deprecated. 
Calculate the time from the first time the logger has been used until now.

Parameters:
splitUp - If set true the runtime will be put out as Xh Ym Zs, otherwise as one number in seconds.

Deprecated. 
Save the logs to a specified file, if no filename is given one will be constructed.

Parameters:
useDate - If true, a date string is put in front of the filename.
path - The path where the log files should be logged.

path - The path (and filename) where the log files should be logged.
